alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 1:59PM CDT until June 05 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 145 PM MDT. * At 1257 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southeast of Wounded Knee, or 12 miles north of Gordon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hoover Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Thunderstorm can produce brief tornadoes and damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
